title: Come Fly With Me Holiday Snaps
creator: BBC Worldwide (Ltd)

extendedInfo.description: The creators of Little Britain bring to you âCome Fly With Me Holiday Snapsâ.Now you can have your picture taken with your favourite characters from the popular BBC series by simply snapping away or editing photos already on your device.You can resize, flip and place the characters wherever you like. Once youâre done, save them to your Holiday Snaps gallery and build up a collection of fun photos or share them with your friends via email, Facebook and Twitter to unlock hilarious video clips and sound bites.The app features a selection of popular video clips and soundbites from the first series.  Now you can see and hear Taaj, Precious and Moses wherever you go!You get me?Please note this app requires access to your address book to allow you to share your snaps.
